channel.title: Datmaker problem help! please

item.title: Datmaker problem help! please
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“i nelson i, post:9, topic:267070”][quote author=MrPotatoHead link=topic=352615.msg2705607#msg2705607 date=1236967331]
EDIT: try this version, scan it as always.

http://uppit.com/7V8SMZ

buttons shifted up and aligned - say if they need going higher.

This is my current version.
buttons labelled 1 and 2 are manual control for removing triangles.
The checkbox needs to be ticked to remove triangles, you have to reload the model to remove them, it does it on loading- just click it again.
The updown arrows are for lazy people.
The ? button is the toggle for the annoying error box.
The 317+508 button doesn’t work -DON’T click it. WIP.
The debug checkbox is just for me -DON’T click it.

This version will also convert from 500+ to 317, remember to remove and bad triangles if you use this (only when you need to though).
It also allows you to export to mqoV2, for editing the animation data.

If you get flashing triangles, uncheck the cull faces.

[/quote]

ty dude this is perfect, i think its cuz i got the new windows 7 the frameowkr wud be wrong or sommet[/quote]

Nope, go to desktop, right click and click properties and then click settings.
where is says “Screen Resolution” move the bar ALL the way to the right and click ok.

Read full topic

buttons shifted up and aligned - say if they need going higher.

This is my current version.
buttons labelled 1 and 2 are manual control for removing triangles.
The checkbox needs to be ticked to remove triangles, you have to reload the model to remove them, it does it on loading- just click it again.
The updown arrows are for lazy people.
The ? button is the toggle for the annoying error box.

item.title: Datmaker problem help! please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

EDIT: try this version, scan it as always.

http://uppit.com/7V8SMZ

buttons shifted up and aligned - say if they need going higher.

This is my current version.
buttons labelled 1 and 2 are manual control for removing triangles.
The checkbox needs to be ticked to remove triangles, you have to reload the model to remove them, it does it on loading- just click it again.
The updown arrows are for lazy people.
The ? button is the toggle for the annoying error box.
The 317+508 button doesn’t work -DON’T click it. WIP.
The debug checkbox is just for me -DON’T click it.

This version will also convert from 500+ to 317, remember to remove and bad triangles if you use this (only when you need to though).
It also allows you to export to mqoV2, for editing the animation data.

If you get flashing triangles, uncheck the cull faces.

Read full topic

item.title: Datmaker problem help! please
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Try increasing the resolution on your computer, go to your desktop and right click, click personalize, then click Display Settings.
Increase the scroller bar to the highest it’ll go.

Read full topic
